short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Linkedin Resume profiles as word document files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Chrome extension that allows you to download the most recent Linkedin profile data from a Linkedin Profile page like education and experience into a single Microsoft Word Document. 

How Does it Work? 

● After installing the extension, browse to a Linkedin Profile page
● Refresh by right clicking the page, and clicking "Reload" or press CTRL+R keys to reload webpage
● On the Linkedin Profile, there should be a button titled "Download Profile DOCX". Click this button. 
● After clicking, Download the generated Microsoft Office Doc file and view it in Microsoft Word
